text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS You should have been learning about Coronavirus in January and February from the scientists and heeded state department warnings. But I forgot— science is “FAKE NEWS”. You didn’t staff the positions nor procur the equipment ahead of time. Too busy golfing.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
